version_description: Minor bug fixes and balance changes

New rewards and lots of tuning and fixes! Thank you Australia and New Zealand players for the great feedback - keep it coming at support@ninjakiwi.com!
Heroic Missions now have Preferred Heroes who give much better rewards!
Fixes to Thorns (too much reflected damage), Hero Battle stability, Tower defense rewards, Catacombs modifiers clarity, guild chat improvements, and more!

Welcome Canadian players! Soft launch in Canada for even more guild and multiplayer action! Plus heaps of player feedback fixes and new content, including:
* Festival Events that give you extra rewards when you use training points, skill points, and skill scrolls
* Awesome new progressive Daily Rewards
* Guild Marks now won through successful Tower Attacks

Thanks for playing and please keep sending feedback to support@ninjakiwi.com or join the community at https://www.facebook.com/TowerKeepers/ - we love hearing from you!

-Fixed more cases that caused double soul skill in Hero Battles
-Promote to Officer fix
-Necromancer's Magic jar fix
-Cavalier soul skill fixed, now correctly increases attack instead of damage
-Various bug fixes

Heaps of game improvements and new content for the worldwide launch of the game! Tons of new stuff, including:
- Added German, French, Indonesian, Italian, Portuguese, Spanish and Turkish languages!
- Wizard's Chosen AI PvP opponent
- Performance improvements, balance changes, and improved rewards
- New Festival Event
- iMessage Stickers!
- Cost to buy food halved
- New quests for Feasts, Wizard's Tower, and Catacombs
- Easier to create guilds
- And lots more (check out the full update notes in game)

-Amazon skill fixes
-Save conflict fixes
-Tap to play bug fix

-Daily deals added to the shop!
-Hero skins! Keep an eye out for your favorite hero's skins being released
-Catacombs maps: Charge up the leaderboards faster with these maps
-The Wizard has appeared in the Wizard Tower, can you defeat him?!
-Some chickens are now extra plump!
-You can now sell more items at once
-Lots of localization fixes
-Gold from selling things is now capped
-Cost to refill food has been capped
-Buffs and tweaks

New Hero! The Valkyrie arrives!
-Keeper level cap increased to 55!
-Potions!
-Bug fixes
-Performance improvements

version_name: 1.9 introduces an awesome new Guild Boss Portal

version_description: Version 1.9 introduces an awesome new Guild Boss Portal, the Dragonâ€™s Hoard Festival event, loads more gear, plus bug fixes and performance improvements. Is your Guild powerful enough to face the Guild Boss, Zaluss the Demolisher?
Fix for save progress issues affecting some players.

-Update 2.0!

-Battle Priest hero added
-New Epic craftable weapons and armor added
-Boss battle final-hit victory bonus removed
-More boss stages added
-Wizard's Chosen now slightly less powerful

Battle Priest's Theologian passive skill fixed
Issue with Boss tickets fixed
Event rewards disappearing fixed
Tweaks to new weapons and armor
Cancel button will disappear once a Hero Battle match is found
